Name: Image segmentation Based on Relative Motion and Relative Disparity Cues (passive fixation)
ReferencesAndLinks: Kohler PJ, Cottereau, BR, Norcia, AM (2019). Image segmentation Based on Relative Motion and Relative Disparity Cues in topographically organized Areas of Human Visual Cortex. Scientific Reports. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41598-019-45036-y
